igeo.gui
Class ITrimCurveGraphic

java.lang.Object
  igeo.gui.ITrimCurveGraphic

public class ITrimCurveGraphic
extends java.lang.Object

Class to convert trim curves to IPolyline and IPolyline2D. Used in ITrimLoopGraphic.

Author:
Satoru Sugihara
See Also:
ITrimLoopGraphic
